text: Allah, yini asamanasamuha upare sthapana karechena khumti chara [1], tomara ta dekhacha [2]. Tarapara tini â€˜arasera upara uthechena [3] ebam surya o camdake niyamadhina karechena [4]; pratyekati nirdista samaya paryanta calabe [5]. Tini saba bisaya paricalana karena, ayatasamuha bisadabhabe barnana karena [6], yate tomara tomadera rabera sange saksata samparke niscita bisbasa karate para
